text: An Affair to Remember is a 1957 American romance movie directed by Leo McCarey and starring Cary Grant, Deborah Kerr, Richard Denning, Neva Patterson, Cathleen Nesbitt. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and was nominated for 4 Academy Awards in 1958. It is a remake of the 1939 movie Love Affair. ==Other websites== * * Category:1957 romance movies Category:American romance movies Category:American movie remakes Category:Movies directed by Leo McCarey Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: An Affair to Remember
